description: Fixed forced-choice questions with unique contextual stems and proper option format

questions.text: When facing unexpected changes in your environment, which statement is MOST like you and which is LEAST like you?

options.text: I modify my methods to fit the situation
I act with transparency in all interactions
I seek out complex and theoretical problems

questions.text: When considering how you interact with others, which statement is MOST like you and which is LEAST like you?

options.text: I avoid manipulating others for personal gain
I remain calm during stressful situations
I seek out complex theoretical problems

questions.text: Thinking about your sense of self and entitlement, which statement is MOST like you and which is LEAST like you?

options.text: I sometimes feel entitled to special treatment
I value fairness above personal gain
I'm comfortable admitting when I don't know something

questions.text: When dealing with challenges at work or in life, which statement is MOST like you and which is LEAST like you?

options.text: I maintain a positive outlook during difficulties

I enjoy navigating through ambiguous situations

questions.text: When your principles are tested, which statement is MOST like you and which is LEAST like you?

options.text: I value fairness more than winning

questions.text: When receiving feedback or criticism, which statement is MOST like you and which is LEAST like you?
